Riscodex not only collects data; verifies, processes and transforms it into value-added outputs that guide decision-making processes.
problem.card3_desc: Significant savings in risk and claims processes

solution.title: Riscodex: The new standard in data-driven insurance
solution.card1_desc: Collects data ranging from industrial events to market trends, cleans, and prepares it for analysis.
solution.card2_desc: Provides foresight and accuracy in risk, pricing, and investment processes with AI-supported models.

tariffeq.description: Our earthquake premium calculation engine actively used in the market. This platform serves hundreds of insurance professionals.

impact.title: Creating Value for the Ecosystem

contact.title: Let's Shape the Future Together
contact.description: Contact us to see how we redefine the insurance, valuation, and investment ecosystem and to request a demo.

claimcore.title: ClaimCore
claimcore.subtitle: Smart Claims Analysis and Reconstruction Cost Calculation
claimcore.feature1_desc: Assess damage scope and severity using video and photo evidence.
claimcore.feature2_desc: Verification to ensure covered losses comply with policy conditions.
claimcore.feature3_desc: Create accurate reconstruction estimates based on current market rates and labor costs.

foresight.title: Foresight
foresight.subtitle: Turkey Fire Map and Risk Analysis
foresight.feature1_desc: Comprehensive records of all forest fire incidents across Turkey, providing broad historical context for risk assessment.
foresight.feature2_desc: Advanced analysis empowered by European Forest Fire Information System (EFFIS) data, ensuring accuracy and international standards.
foresight.feature3_desc: AI-driven risk assessment and fire impact analysis based on precise geographic coordinates and proximity factors.

locateloss.title: LocateLoss
locateloss.subtitle: Industrial Loss Analysis
locateloss.feature1_desc: Comprehensive database containing detailed incident information and financial impact data for all industrial losses in Turkey.
locateloss.feature2_desc: Utilization of all sources including official reports, news sources, and industry databases for maximum data reliability.
locateloss.feature3_desc: AI-powered correlation analysis between damaged facilities and coordinates, revealing proximity risks and identifying accumulation zones.

lossanalysis.title: LossAnalysis
lossanalysis.subtitle: Earthquake Loss Estimation
lossanalysis.feature1_desc: Estimate structural damage and business interruption losses for facilities using advanced seismic modeling and structural vulnerability analysis.
lossanalysis.feature2_desc: Analyze scenarios with machine learning algorithms considering multiple variables including building type, soil conditions, and seismic history.
lossanalysis.feature3_desc: Determine appropriate coverage limits and recommend optimal deductible levels based on maximum probable loss calculations.

polycheck.title: Polycheck
polycheck.subtitle: Policy Text Check and Compliance Verification
polycheck.feature1_desc: Scan detailed policy terms and conditions for comprehensive compliance verification.
polycheck.feature2_desc: Cross-reference against company standard texts and reinsurance treaty requirements.
polycheck.feature3_desc: Extract inconsistent clauses and report them with recommended corrections for Underwriters.

precast.title: Precast
precast.subtitle: Gross Policy Premium Prediction
precast.feature1_desc: Calculations compatible with Turkish insurance market pricing methodology, providing competitive and accurate premium estimates.
precast.feature2_desc: Potential gross premium calculations based on comprehensive risk parameters and historical market data.
precast.feature3_desc: Instant premium quote generation and comparison capabilities, significantly speeding up the underwriting process.

revisor.title: Revisor
revisor.subtitle: AI-Supported Online Risk Survey Platform
revisor.feature1_desc: Complete risk assessments without the need for long field visits, reducing audit time by up to 70%.
revisor.feature2_desc: AI-powered image recognition automatically identifies potential hazards and compliance issues.
revisor.feature3_desc: Longitudinal tracking of past survey data and analysis of changes over time.

tariffeq.title: TariffEQ
tariffeq.subtitle: Earthquake Premium Calculator and Comparison Tool
tariffeq.feature1_desc: Precise detection of earthquake zones automatically updated to reflect the latest seismic data and regional classifications.
tariffeq.feature2_desc: User-friendly interface providing quick tariff calculations with intuitive navigation and streamlined workflows.
tariffeq.feature3_desc: Compare all coinsurance and deductible rates side-by-side to optimize policy structures and pricing strategies.
tariffeq.feature4_desc: Detailed reporting in both PDF and Excel formats providing comprehensive documentation for every calculation.

vallist.title: Vallist
vallist.subtitle: Online Asset Valuation and Reconciliation Tool
vallist.feature1_desc: Create remote 'agreed-value' reports without time-consuming facility visits.
vallist.feature2_desc: Calculate accurate depreciation rates for covered assets and equipment.
vallist.feature3_desc: Apply current market valuations for replacement cost calculations.
